pageTitle: Nation LTD Key West Tee | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 24in / 61cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. 58% modal/38% polyester/4% spandex. Fabric: Soft fine knit. A striped top with a loose fit is at once casual and effortless. A subtly rounded hem skims the hips. Elbow-length sleeves. Description Tops > Clothing > Nation LTD > video play
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Inspired by her dad’s V-necks, Jen Menchaca founded Nation LTD in 2005 with a mission to create the perfect white tee for women. Based in Los Angeles, Nation LTD clothing has evolved from that one simple tee into a premiere women’s collection sold worldwide. Distinguished by its premium ultra-soft fabrics, vintage details, and elegant style, Nation LTD is worn by trendsetting celebrities and chic women of all ages. True to its roots, this effortlessly sexy line is manufactured entirely in the USA. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime
